Strong (weak) ACE events are defined as having ACE index values of ≥0.5 (≤–0.5) standard deviation. A threshold value of daily ACE index in the selected region equal to 1 m 2 s –2 is used to define the genesis or disappearance of TCs. A single ACE event is associated with the whole process from ACE generation to disappearance.
